body:
This PR:

- [x] adds support for the "latest" QT 4,
- [x] fixes an error in the `package` script that manifests on mac+clang builds,
- [x] fixes the build for High Sierra,
- [x] allows more components of QT to be disabled to improve chance of success
- [x] adds "+static" variant so it can be (in theory) built statically

Fixes #12139
title: Fix QT4 build for mac
